mapper.select: SELECT password FROM MEMBER WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT pertype FROM MEMBER WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT id AS id, password AS password, sex AS sex, calender AS calender, TO_CHAR(birth, 'yyyy') AS year, TO_CHAR(birth, 'mm') AS month, TO_CHAR(birth, 'dd') AS day, addressnum AS addressnum, address1 AS address1, address2 AS address2, email AS email, phone AS phone, interest_land_total AS interestLandTotal, trip_style_list AS tripStyleList, inc_tripno AS incTripno, outc_tripno AS outcTripno, pertype AS pertype FROM MEMBER WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, password, sex, calender, birth, addressnum, address1, address2, email, phone, interest_land_total, trip_style_list, inc_tripno, outc_tripno, pertype) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{calender}, #{birth}, #{addressnum}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{interestLandTotal}, #{tripStyleList},#{incTripno}, #{outcTripno}, #{pertype})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET password = #{password}, calender = #{calender}, birth = #{birth}, addressnum = #{addressnum}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, interest_land_total = #{interestLandTotal}, trip_style_list = #{tripStyleList}, inc_tripno = #{incTripno}, outc_tripno = #{outcTripno} WHERE id=#{id}
